title: Italian Grammar Basics - Present Tense
prompt: Study the present tense conjugation patterns and practice with the exercises
extraInfo: Focus on regular -are, -ere, and -ire verbs. Pay attention to irregular verbs like essere and avere.

title: Italian Cooking Show - Pasta Making
prompt: Watch this cooking show and try to understand the instructions and ingredients mentioned
extraInfo: This is a popular Italian cooking channel. The host speaks clearly and uses lots of food vocabulary.

title: Spanish News Podcast - Daily Briefing
prompt: Listen to the daily news briefing and try to catch the main headlines
extraInfo: This podcast is designed for Spanish learners. They speak slowly and clearly.

title: Le Petit Prince - Chapter 1 Audio Book
prompt: Listen to the first chapter of Le Petit Prince and follow along with the text
extraInfo: This is a classic French children's book. The language is simple but beautiful.

title: German Cases Explained - Nominative and Accusative
prompt: Study the German case system, focusing on nominative and accusative cases
extraInfo: German cases are fundamental to understanding sentence structure. Start with these two basic cases.

title: Studio Ghibli Film - My Neighbor Totoro
prompt: Watch this film with Japanese audio and English subtitles. Focus on common phrases and greetings.
extraInfo: Studio Ghibli films are great for Japanese learners. The dialogue is clear and the stories are engaging.

title: My Italian Recipe Collection
prompt: Review my collection of Italian recipes and practice reading cooking instructions
extraInfo: This is my personal collection of recipes I've gathered. Good for learning food vocabulary and imperative verbs.
